detail_desc: Metal rings in various designs.
Fitted tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Glittery Alice band with antlers on top.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, sleeveless top in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a sweetheart neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Sun hat in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Flounced brim with a decorative bow at the back, and ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim approx. 4.5 cm.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative bow at the front.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with glitter, a round neckline and buttons at the back. Seam at the waist with a large bow at the front and a flared skirt with several layers of tulle. Lined.
Poncho top with short butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.
Fully lined strapless swimsuit with cut-out, drawstring sections at the sides and high-cut legs. Detachable straps that tie at the back of the neck.
Elastic waist belt covered in gathered imitation leather with a metal fastener at the front.
Top and leggings with a motif. Longer top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif and long raglan sleeves. Leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
3/4-length outdoor trousers in stretch, partially water-repellent fabric. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, a leg pocket with a taped zip, front pockets and seams on the legs.
Longjohns in soft organic cotton jersey with and elasticated waist, button fly and ribbed hems.

Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in a jacquard weave with a sheen. V-neck, gathered yoke and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey with decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Ankle boots with lacing and a small platform at the front, high block heels and chunky soles. Platform 2 cm, heels 9.5 cm.
Dungaree dress in patterned stretch cotton twill with press-studs at the sides, adjustable straps with metal fasteners at the front, and front and back pockets.
Wide trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and straight, wide legs with creases.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a detachable, lined hood in jersey, a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Decorative fabric appliqués, flap chest pockets with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Vest top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Shorts with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, motif on the front and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.

MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with a decorative frill at the top, press-stud on the shoulders, short sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Short T-shirt dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in a viscose weave with an opening and ties at the front. Hemstitching and a decorative lace panel at the top, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt. Jersey-lined skirt.
Boxy-style top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated neckline and smocked edges around the sleeves and hem.

Boxy jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Fully lined, seersucker bikini. Top with flounce-trimmed elasticated shoulder straps that cross at the back. Bottoms with elastication and a flounce at the waist.
Trousers in a lightweight viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft jersey made from organic cotton with buttons at the top, elastication at the back and buttons at the sides. Seams on the legs with decorative buttons, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 0-12M.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh shoulder straps and a narrow racer back with elastic straps.
Sleeveless top in sturdy, crinkled jersey with a decorative seam centre front and concealed zip at the back.
Shirt in cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Pre-tied tie/bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener.
Make-up bag a zip at the top that continues down the short sides. Lined. Size approx. 7x11.5x18.5 cm.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. One plain pair and five pairs decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length from 2 cm to 3.5 cm.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with no lapels or fasteners. Jetted front pockets and long sleeves with a metal stud and slit at the cuffs. Lined.

Down jacket in nylon with a light sheen and lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, side pockets and an elasticated drawstring at the rounded hem. Lined. Filling 90% down, 10% feathers.
Ankle-length treggings in sturdy cotton jersey, one pair with an all-over print. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Imitation leather boots with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 10 cm.
Pile jacket with a wide collar and visible zip down the front. Diagonal side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem.

Short dress in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon. Wide neckline with a small opening and drawstring at the front, and long sleeves with a flounced trim at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.
Jumper knitted in soft cashmere with a round neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Oversized, knee-length top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and gathered ribbing at the cuffs. Decorative embroidery at the front and a kangaroo pocket. Soft brushed inside.

Top in supersoft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline. Longer at the back. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Cardigan knitted in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shawl collar, buttons down the front, welt side pockets, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with overlocked frill trims at the front and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 2-3Y). Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Turtleneck jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool and some alpaca wool. Extra-long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short coat in soft faux shearling with a rounded collar, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Recycled polyester lining.

Relaxed-fit dress shirt in cool silk with a high, buttoned collar and detachable ties at the top that tie at the back of the neck. Shirt front with pleats and concealed buttons down the front, extra-long sleeves, wide cuffs with pearly buttons, and a rounded hem.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a regular waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Triangle bikini top with padded cups, laser-cut edges and ties at the back of the neck and back.
Long-sleeved Henley tops in soft cotton jersey.

Long-sleeved bodysuit in a shirt style made in a soft cotton weave with a button-down collar, button placket and chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, buttoned cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button and raw-edge hems.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbed trims around the neckline and armholes.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey containing some linen with short sleeves, a roll edge around the neckline and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Trainers in imitation leather with details in mesh and rubber. Lacing at the front with laces that have reflective details, and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, a short slit at the front and a raw-edge hem.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers in lightweight jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and elasticated hems.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend in a wide, relaxed fit with a wrapover V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No buttons.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg.
Cargo trousers in crisp cotton poplin with a zip fly and button, and front, back and leg pockets, all with a flap and button. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Knee-length wrap dress in soft, viscose jersey crêpe with a V-neck, narrow, elasticated seam under the bust and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.

Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners. The polyamide content of the bra is partly recycled.
